description: This source file defines a Flutter application that displays a simple UI with a title and a loading indicator, serving as the frontend for a chess clock application.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter app, setting up theme and initial route.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main page, holding the title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI of MyHomePage, building the scaffold with an app bar and body.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the Dart application, runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp and _MyHomePageState widgets, constructing the widget tree.
